hothouse.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a heated building, usually made of glass, where delicate plants can grow
hothouse.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to give a child a lot of education at a young age because you want them to be very good at something - often used to show disapproval
hothouse.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Some parents hothouse their children by giving them educational toys when they are very young.
